author: mariohavel
content:
<@&857649635274915900> I am very sorry folks but we have to cancel today's Office Hours AMA :/ Phil had an emergency and cannot make it.

Do you have anything you'd like to discuss with me and other fellows? We can still do informal office hours and chat if many of you are interested. 

Otherwise, we will meet next week in Cannes and Office Hours/Standups will continue the week after that. Next week we are not meeting online because we will be at the conference

author: dimitriosmitsios
content:
I am getting worried about many people choosing the same project or client team in general
. This Sunday is devoted to that but if people find it beneficial I would be happy to discuss it today!

author: nenarapsody
content: Thanks for the update! I'll take the chance and use that time to keep on working on the EthCC presentation

author: harsh.ps.2003
content: Intros with other fellows remained incomplete! I was getting to know very interesting folks.

author: mariohavel
content: Indeed, there are many fellows looking into similar projects. There is the signaling thread so we can track it more easily https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/1384203215360229458/1384203218065555619

author: mariohavel
content:
Based on this, please reach out to fellows who are working on same or related project, create a group if there is more of you. It's important to discuss it together because each should consider 
1) whether the project is the best match for your skills and area of knowledge,
2) if you are honestly motivated because you find the project interesting, right kind of challenge for you (not because it's easy or cool) 
3) your long term plans, whether you are just trying to learn or seriously want to work with a client team long term

author: mariohavel
content: I will be hanging out in the call for for 10-15 min. Join if you have anything to discuss or missed Monday. https://meet.ethereum.org/epf-office-hours
